name: LIT!
description:
Manage your "Light" storage and ignite your way through waves of shadow creatures in Arcade fashion!

Trijam

My first Jam game, made in GameMaker Studio 2, under 3 hours for Trijam#181.

The Theme was: Storage Management.

Pre-made assets: some functions, all sound effects and the font.

Controls

W/A/S/D: Movement

Mouse: Aim/Shoot

R: Restart

Alt+Enter: Fullscreen
